channel.title: Tentacles
channel.description: So, Tentacles. Right now, the Tentacle seems to be hardwired around the Blast Pit chamber and will slam its head into three different tiers of platforms, even if they don't exist. It would be nice if we could, at a minimum, lock it to the "floor" level so it doesn't raise itself up and down. This seems like something that would be necessary for Xen in any case.

item.title: Tentacles
item.dc:creator: Maki
item.description:
So, Tentacles. Right now, the Tentacle seems to be hardwired around the Blast Pit chamber and will slam its head into three different tiers of platforms, even if they don’t exist. It would be nice if we could, at a minimum, lock it to the “floor” level so it doesn’t raise itself up and down. This seems like something that would be necessary for Xen in any case.

Read full topic
